title: [EUW] Dia 5 (P5 atm) Midlaner LF Mate (preferably jungler) for duo some duo games!
body:
Hi, I'm the Retarded Duck and I'm looking for a nice mate to play some rankeds with!

I'm a very relaxed and easy guy, I like to laugh a lot and just have my fun playing the game, although still try harding, obviously! ^-^
I got placed G1 and I'm sitting in P5 atm, tryna climb back up asap. 
My most preferred champs are as follows:
{{champion:268}} (<- RIP you will be missed ;-; ) {{champion:163}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:115}} 

Ive got discord, ts and skype available for coms and well... I'm just looking for someone to have a good time with and not get tilted as hell after a loss or some fuck ups. I'm the kinda guy who judges only himself, hardly ever anyone else.. considering thats of no help anyway. So you should fit me well, mostly concerning the relaxed and no tilt part... would appreciate you not to flame as well, that'd be great!

Apart from that I wish you all a good evening and feel free to hit me up ingame!

Greets,
RetardedDuckling

Edit: Ich sprech auch deutsch, mein Fehler. :D
